name: (G)I-DLE
description: (G)I-DLE is a self-producing girl group known for their unique concepts, powerful performances, and member Soyeon's songwriting and producing skills.

funFacts: Was a YG trainee for years before joining Cube
Almost debuted with BLACKPINK
Known for her crystal-clear vocals
Has MC'd various shows including Running Man
Her visual is often compared to classic Korean beauty
members.bio: Miyeon is (G)I-DLE's main vocalist and visual. She was a YG trainee who almost debuted with BLACKPINK. Her clear, powerful vocals and classic Korean beauty have made her a beloved member.

funFacts: Born and raised in Thailand
Known for her unique, husky voice
Has composed several (G)I-DLE songs
Very fashionable and loves shopping
Fluent in Thai, English, and Korean
members.bio: Minnie is (G)I-DLE's Thai main vocalist known for her distinctive husky voice. She's not only a vocalist but also a talented songwriter who has contributed to the group's discography.

funFacts: Writes and produces almost all (G)I-DLE songs
Competed on Produce 101 and Unpretty Rapstar
Considered one of the best female rappers in K-Pop
Has worked with artists outside of Cube
Her leadership style is bold and confident
members.bio: Soyeon is (G)I-DLE's genius leader who writes and produces their music. Despite being the shortest member, her talent is immense. She's considered one of the best female rappers and producers in K-Pop.

funFacts: Born in Beijing, China
Known for her surprisingly deep, husky voice
Hugely popular in China as a variety show star
Her personality is bubbly and energetic
One of the most recognized Chinese idols in Korea
members.bio: Yuqi is (G)I-DLE's Chinese member known for her deep voice and bubbly personality. She's a variety show star in China and brings international appeal. Her contrast between cute looks and deep voice is charming.

funFacts: Born in Tainan, Taiwan
Known for her savage, fearless personality
Struggled with Korean but worked hard to improve
Her blunt honesty is loved by fans
Very close with all members despite being maknae
members.bio: Shuhua is (G)I-DLE's Taiwanese maknae and visual. Despite struggling with Korean initially, her savage personality and blunt honesty won fans over. She's known for her fearless attitude and stunning visuals.

seo.title: (G)I-DLE Name Generator | Create Your Korean Name with NEVERLAND
seo.description: Create your (G)I-DLE name with Miyeon, Minnie, Soyeon, Yuqi & Shuhua! Get instant chemistry scores and Korean stage names. Perfect for NEVERLAND.
